Uses of Package
com.inrupt.client

  • Packages that use com.inrupt.client 
    Package Description
    com.inrupt.client
    Application interfaces for the Inrupt client libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.spi
    Service interfaces for the Inrupt client libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.util  
  • Classes in com.inrupt.client used by com.inrupt.client 
    Class Description
    Authenticator
    An interface for handling authentication challenges.
    Authenticator.AccessToken
    A class containing information about an OAuth 2.0 access token.
    Authenticator.Challenge
    Part of the HTTP Challenge and Response authentication framework, this class represents a challenge object as represented in a WWW-Authenticate Response Header.
    Authenticator.DPoP
    An abstraction for working with OAuth 2.0 Demonstrating Proof-of-Possession at the Application Layer (DPoP).
    Client  
    Client.Builder  
    Client.Session
    A session abstraction for managing access tokens for an agent.
    Headers
    A read-only view of a collection of HTTP headers.
    Headers.Link
    A class for representing an HTTP Link header.
    Headers.WacAllow
    a class for parsing WAC-allow headers.
    Headers.WwwAuthenticate
    Part of the HTTP Challenge and Response authentication framework, this class represents a challenge object as represented in a WWW-Authenticate Response Header.
    Quad
    An RDF Quad.
    RDFNode
    An RDF node.
    Request
    An HTTP Request.
    Request.BodyPublisher
    An API for serializing an HTTP Request.
    Request.Builder
    A Request builder.
    Response
    An HTTP Response.
    Response.BodyHandler
    An interface for mapping an HTTP response into a specific Java type.
    Response.ResponseInfo
    Initial response info supplied to a Response.BodyHandler before the body is processed.
    Syntax
    The names of concrete RDF Syntaxes.
    Triple
    An RDF Triple.
    VerifiableCredential
    A data object for a Verifiable Credential.
